column12: 스티렌계 중합체에 기반한 팽창 가능한 열가소성 중합체 입자 및 이의 제조 방법
column13: 본 발명은 스티렌계 중합체에 기반한 팽창 가능한 중합체 입자, 이의 제조 방법 및 성형된 발포체 부분에서의 팽창 가능한 중합체 입자의 용도에 관한 것이다. 상기 중합체 입자는 A) (A), (B) 및 (C)의 총 중량과 관련하여, 87 내지 99 중량%의 하나 이상의 스티렌계 중합체(A); B) 1 내지 10 중량%의 하나 이상의 발포제(B); C) 0 내지 3 중량%의 하나 이상의 핵형성제 또는 핵형성화제(C); 및 도메인 형성 및 이로부터 형성되는 발포체 구조체를 손상시키지 않는 양의 선택적인 추가 첨가제(Z)를 함유한다.
column15: WILHELMUS BIANCA;;VAN VEEN YVONNE;;DORR DOMINIK;;GROSCHEL SEBASTIAN;;STANDAU TOBIAS;;ALTSTADT VOLKER;;WEBER REGINO;;NEUMEYER THOMAS;;SCHREIER PETER;;LOHNER MAX

column13: The invention refers to a method for producing expanded polymer pellets, which comprises the following steps: melting a polymer comprising a polyamide; adding at least one blowing agent; expanding the melt through at least one die for producing an expanded polymer; and pelletizing the expanded polymer. The invention further concerns polymer pellets produced with the method as well as their use, e.g. for the production of cushioning elements for sports apparel, such as for producing soles or parts of soles of sports shoes. A further aspect of the invention concerns a method for the manufacture of molded components, comprising loading pellets of an expanded polymer material into a mold, and connecting the pellets by providing heat energy, wherein the expanded polymer material of the pellets or beads comprises a chain extender. The molded components may be used in broad ranges of application.

column13: To provide an expanded polymer pellet capable of being manufactured in a process range as wide as possible, and further processed for manufacturing stable parts capable of being used in wide range applications, for example parts having attenuation characteristic and low weight.SOLUTION: The invention relates to a method for manufacturing an expanded polymer pellet, including a step for melting a polymer containing polyamide; a step for adding at least one kind of foaming agent; a step for expanding a molten article through at least one die for manufacturing an expanded polymer; a process for pelleting the expanded polymer.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1

column13: The invention discloses a method for manufacturing expanded polyamide pellets. The method comprises the following steps: melting a polymer comprising a polyamide; adding at least one blowing agent; expanding the melt through at least one die for producing an expanded polymer; and pelletizing the expanded polymer. The invention further concerns polymer pellets produced with the method as well as their use, e.g. for the production of cushioning elements for sports apparel, such as for producing soles or parts of soles of sports shoes. A further aspect of the invention concerns a method for the manufacture of molded components, comprising loading pellets of an expanded polymer material into a mold, and connecting the pellets by providing heat energy, wherein the expanded polymer material of the pellets or beads comprises a chain extender. The molded components may be used in broad ranges of application.

column13: 본 발명은 팽창된 폴리머 펠릿들을 생성하는 방법에 관한 것이며, 이는 다음 단계들: 폴리아미드를 포함한 폴리머를 용융하는 단계; 적어도 하나의 발포제를 첨가하는 단계; 팽창된 폴리머를 생성하기 위해 적어도 하나의 다이를 통해 용융물을 팽창시키는 단계; 및 팽창된 폴리머를 펠릿화하는 단계를 포함한다. 또한, 본 발명은 상기 방법으로 생성된 폴리머 펠릿들, 및 예를 들어 스포츠 의류용 완충 요소들의 생성을 위한, 예컨대 스포츠 슈즈의 창들 또는 창들의 부분들을 생성하기 위한 이들의 사용에 관련된다. 본 발명의 또 다른 실시형태는 몰딩된 구성요소들의 제조를 위한 방법에 관련되며, 이는 몰드로 팽창된 폴리머 재료의 펠릿들을 로딩하는 단계, 및 열 에너지를 제공함으로써 펠릿들을 연결하는 단계를 포함하고, 이때 펠릿들 또는 비드들의 팽창된 폴리머 재료는 사슬 연장제를 포함한다. 몰딩된 구성요소들은 광범위한 적용에서 사용될 수 있다.
column15: SMITH PAUL;;HILL JAN;;WARDLAW ANGUS;;PRICE DANIEL STEPHEN;;TARRIER JAMES;;ROBERTSON CHRISTOPHER;;HOLMES CHRISTOPHER EDWARD;;LE HUU MINH TRU;;KERLING SABRINA;;KIRUPANANTHAM DHARAN;;ALTSTADT VOLKER;;FATHI AMIR;;RAPS DANIEL;;KEILHOLZ CLEMENS;;KOPPL THOMAS

column13: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide an expanded polymer pellet capable of being manufactured in a process range as wide as possible, and further processed for manufacturing stable parts capable of being used in wide range applications, for example parts having attenuation characteristic and low weight.SOLUTION: The invention relates to a method for manufacturing an expanded polymer pellet, including a step for melting a polymer containing polyamide; a step for adding at least one kind of foaming agent; a step for expanding a molten article through at least one die for manufacturing an expanded polymer; a process for pelleting the expanded polymer.SELECTED DRAWING: Figure 1
column15: SMITH PAUL;;JAN HILL;;ANGUS WARDLAW;;DANIEL STEPHEN PRICE;;JAMES TARRIER;;CHRISTOPHER ROBERTSON;;CHRISTOPHER EDWARD HOLMES;;LE HUU MINH TRU;;SABRINA KERLING;;DHARAN KIRUPANANTHAM;;VOLKER ALTSTADT;;AMIR FATHI;;DANIEL RAPS;;CLEMENS KEILHOLZ;;THOMAS KOPPL

column12: Expanded polyamide pellets and method for manufacturing molded parts using same
column13: The invention relates to a method for manufacturing molded parts. The method comprises steps of loading pellets of expanded polymer material into a mold, wherein the expanded polymer material of the pellets contains additives that increase the amorphous content of the polymer material; and connecting the pellets by heating the pellets to a temperature between the glass transition temperature and the temperature below the melting start of the expanded polymer material. Molded parts can be used in a wide range of applications.

column12: Expanded polyamide pellets and method for manufacturing molded components using same
column13: The invention discloses expanded polyamide pellets and a method for manufacturing molded components using the same. The invention refers to a method for producing expanded polymer pellets, which comprises the following steps: melting a polymer comprising a polyamide; adding at least one blowing agent; expanding the melt through at least one die for producing an expanded polymer; and pelletizing the expanded polymer. The invention further concerns polymer pellets produced with the method as well as their use, e.g. for the production of cushioning elements for sports apparel, such as for producing soles or parts of soles of sports shoes. A further aspect of the invention concerns a method for the manufacture of molded components, comprising loading pellets of an expanded polymer material into a mold, and connecting the pellets by providing heat energy, wherein the expanded polymer material of the pellets or beads comprises a chain extender. The molded components may be used in broad ranges of application.

column12: EXPANDED POLYAMIDE PELLET AND METHOD FOR MANUFACTURE OF MOLDED COMPONENTS USING THE SAME
column13: To provide an expanded polymer pellet that can be produced in as wide a processing window as possible and can be further processed to form stable parts usable in a wide range of applications, for example, for the manufacture of pars having damping properties and a low weight.SOLUTION: A method for producing a pellet of an expanded polymer material includes: a step of melting a polymer including a polyamide; a step of adding at least one kind of blowing agent; a step of expanding the melt through at least one die for producing an expanded polymer; and a step of pelletizing the expanded polymer. A method for the manufacture of molded components includes the steps of: loading the pellet into a mold; and connecting the pellets by providing heat energy in which the expanded polymer material of the pellet or bead includes a chain extender.SELECTED DRAWING: None

column12: Expanded polyamide pellets and method for manufacturing molded components using same
column13: The invention discloses expanded polyamide pellets and a method for manufacturing molded components using the same. The invention refers to a method for producing expanded polymer pellets, which comprises the following steps: melting a polymer comprising a polyamide; adding at least one blowing agent; expanding the melt through at least one die for producing an expanded polymer; and pelletizing the expanded polymer. The invention further concerns polymer pellets produced with the method as well as their use, e.g. for the production of cushioning elements for sports apparel, such as for producing soles or parts of soles of sports shoes. A further aspect of the invention concerns a method for the manufacture of molded components, comprising loading pellets of an expanded polymer material into a mold, and connecting the pellets by providing heat energy, wherein the expanded polymer material of the pellets or beads comprises a chain extender. The molded components may be used in broad ranges of application.

column12: Expanded polyamide pellets and method for manufacturing molded components using same
column13: The invention discloses a method for manufacturing molded components using expanded polyamide pellets. The method comprises the following steps: melting a polymer comprising a polyamide; adding at least one blowing agent; expanding the melt through at least one die for producing an expanded polymer; and pelletizing the expanded polymer. The invention further concerns polymer pellets produced with the method as well as their use, e.g. for the production of cushioning elements for sports apparel, such as for producing soles or parts of soles of sports shoes. A further aspect of the invention concerns a method for the manufacture of molded components, comprising loading pellets of an expanded polymer material into a mold, and connecting the pellets by providing heat energy, wherein the expanded polymer material of the pellets or beads comprises a chain extender. The molded components may be used in broad ranges of application.
